data.name: Weighing_BarcodeScanHint
data.value: Scan with barcode gun, press Enter to jump to weight

data.name: Weighing_ErrorWeightRequired
data.value: Please enter weight (must be greater than 0)

data.name: Records_MyRecordsHint
data.value: Currently showing: My records (Operators can only view their own records)

data.name: Customer_Subtitle
data.value: Manage customer profiles and contact information

data.name: Customer_SearchPlaceholder
data.value: Search by customer name, code or contact...

data.name: Customer_CodeHint
data.value: For system identification, must be unique

data.name: Customer_CodeNote
data.value: Customer code cannot be modified once created

data.name: Customer_HelpTip
data.value: Customer info is mainly used for weighing record archiving. Optional fields can be left empty.

data.name: Customer_ActiveStatus
data.value: Active (customer can be used for production records)

data.name: Customer_EditWarning
data.value: Modifying customer info won't affect historical records

data.name: User_Subtitle
data.value: Manage system user accounts and permissions (Admin only)

data.name: User_NoData
data.value: No user data. Click "Add User" button to create the first user

data.name: User_ConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure to delete user '{0}'? This action cannot be undone!

data.name: User_UsernameNote
data.value: Username is used for login and cannot be changed after creation

data.name: User_RoleWarning
data.value: Be careful with admin permissions! Admins can manage users, view reports, and modify system settings

data.name: User_SecurityTip3
data.value: Do not assign admin permissions to regular operators

data.name: User_UsernameReadonly
data.value: Username cannot be changed after creation

data.name: User_DisableNote
data.value: Disabled users cannot log in to the system

data.name: User_NewPasswordPlaceholder
data.value: Leave empty to keep current password

data.name: User_NewPasswordNote
data.value: Enter new password (4-6 characters) to reset

data.name: User_EditNote4
data.value: Password reset only applies when new password is entered

data.name: Report_Subtitle
data.value: View production statistics, analyze output and loss by stage

data.name: Report_NoData
data.value: No production data in selected period

data.name: Chart_LossRateLegend
data.value: Higher loss rate = Darker color (Red > Yellow > Blue > Green)

data.name: Tracing_Subtitle
data.value: Trace complete production process by barcode

data.name: Tracing_NotFound
data.value: No records found for this barcode

data.name: Tracing_NotFoundHint
data.value: Please check if the barcode is correct, or it has not been entered into the system

data.name: Tracing_ScanHint
data.value: Supports barcode scanner or manual input

data.name: Settings_Subtitle
data.value: Admin only - Configure system parameters and hardware settings

data.name: Settings_HardwareNote
data.value: Edit appsettings.json to modify hardware settings, restart required

data.name: Profile_Subtitle
data.value: View account information and operation statistics

data.name: Profile_NameSameError
data.value: New name is the same as current name

data.name: Login_ErrorEmpty
data.value: Username and password cannot be empty

data.name: Login_ErrorFailed
data.value: Login failed, please check your username and password

data.name: ProcessStages_Description
data.value: Manage process stages in production workflow

data.name: ProcessStages_UpdateStatusFailed
data.value: Failed to update process stage status

data.name: ProcessStages_ConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this process stage? This action cannot be undone!

data.name: ProcessStages_CodeHint
data.value: Unique identifier for the stage, uppercase letters recommended

data.name: ProcessStages_TypeHint
data.value: For loss rate calculation: start stage as baseline, end stage for comparison

data.name: ProcessStages_IncludeInLossRateHint
data.value: When checked, this stage's data will be included in loss rate statistics

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideCode
data.value: Stage Code: Must be unique, uppercase letters recommended, e.g., RECEIVING, PROCESSING, SHIPPING

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideName
data.value: Stage Name: Display name for users, e.g., Raw Material Receiving, Processing, Finished Product Shipping

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideSortOrder
data.value: Sort Order: Controls the order of stages in the list

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideTypeStart
data.value: Start Stage: Beginning of production process (e.g., raw material receiving)

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideTypeMiddle
data.value: Middle Stage: Processing steps in production

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideTypeEnd
data.value: End Stage: End of production process (e.g., finished product shipping)

data.name: ProcessStages_FormGuideIncludeInLossRate
data.value: Include in Loss Rate: When checked, this stage's data will be included in loss rate calculations

data.name: ProcessStages_CodeReadonly
data.value: Stage code cannot be modified after creation

data.name: ProcessStages_ActiveHint
data.value: When deactivated, this stage cannot be used for new weighing records

data.name: ProcessStages_UsageWarningMessage
data.value: This stage is used by {0} weighing records and cannot be deleted. To deactivate, uncheck the "Activate Stage" option.

data.name: MeatTypes_ConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this meat type? This action cannot be undone!

data.name: MeatTypes_ConfirmRegenerate
data.value: Are you sure you want to regenerate all QR codes for this meat type? This will delete old QR codes and regenerate them for all active employees.

data.name: MeatTypes_CreateDescription
data.value: Create a new raw meat category

data.name: MeatTypes_CodeHint
data.value: Unique identifier for the type, uppercase letters recommended

data.name: MeatTypes_CodeReadonly
data.value: Type code cannot be modified after creation

data.name: MeatTypes_ActiveHint
data.value: When deactivated, this type cannot be used in the system

data.name: MeatTypes_ActiveHintCreate
data.value: When checked, this type can be used in the system

data.name: MeatTypes_EditGuide1
data.value: Type code cannot be modified to ensure data consistency

data.name: MeatTypes_EditGuide2
data.value: Modifying type name will affect all places using this type

data.name: MeatTypes_EditGuide3
data.value: Adjusting sort order can change the position in the list

data.name: MeatTypes_EditGuide4
data.value: Deactivating a type does not delete data, just temporarily unavailable

data.name: MeatTypes_LoadFailed2
data.value: Failed to load meat type information:

data.name: MeatTypes_FormGuideCode
data.value: Type Code: Must be unique, uppercase letters recommended, e.g., PORK, BEEF, MUTTON

data.name: MeatTypes_FormGuideName
data.value: Type Name: Display name for users, e.g., Pork, Beef, Mutton, Chicken, Duck, Fish

data.name: MeatTypes_FormGuideSortOrder
data.value: Sort Order: Controls the order of types in the list, smaller numbers appear first

data.name: MeatTypes_FormGuideActive
data.value: Active Status: Only active types can be used in the system

data.name: MeatTypes_FormGuideDescription
data.value: Description: Optional, used to supplement detailed information about the type

data.name: QRCodes_Description
data.value: Manage meat product QR code labels

data.name: QRCodes_ConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this QR code?

data.name: QRCodes_MeatTypeHint
data.value: Select the meat type associated with the QR code

data.name: QRCodes_CodeHint
data.value: Enter unique code, will be combined with meat type code to generate QR code content

data.name: QRCodes_BatchNumberHint
data.value: Optional, used for batch management and traceability

data.name: QRCodes_PreviewHint
data.value: Select meat type and enter code to display QR code preview

data.name: QRCodes_ContentRuleDesc
data.value: QR code content is generated by combining meat type code and code:

data.name: QRCodes_CodeSuggestion4
data.value: Ensure code is unique within the same meat type

data.name: QRCodes_BatchUsageDesc
data.value: Batch number is used to group multiple QR codes for:

data.name: QRCodes_StatusHint
data.value: Inactive QR codes cannot be used

data.name: QRCodes_PrefixHint
data.value: Optional, leave empty for no prefix

data.name: QRCodes_BatchCreateWarning
data.value: Batch creating more than 100 QR codes may take a long time, please be patient.

data.name: QRCodes_StartNumberGreaterThanEnd
data.value: Start number cannot be greater than end number

data.name: QRCodes_BatchCreateLimit
data.value: Batch creation cannot exceed 1000 QR codes at once

data.name: QRCodes_ValidNumberRequired
data.value: Please enter valid start and end numbers

data.name: QRCode_NotFound
data.value: QR code not found! Please create it in QR code management first.

data.name: QRCode_Inactive
data.value: QR code unavailable! This QR code has been deactivated.

data.name: Product_ReferencePriceNote

data.name: Product_ActiveCheckbox
data.value: Active Status (Check to enable batch for production)

data.name: Product_HelpName
data.value: Batch Name: Easy-to-identify name, recommended format: Category-Date-Sequence

data.name: Product_HelpSpecification
data.value: Supplier/Spec: Record supplier information for quality traceability

data.name: Product_HelpUnit
data.value: Unit: Common units include: kg, g, pcs, cases, etc.

data.name: Product_HelpReferencePrice
data.value: Reference Price: Can be left blank for production management, reference only

data.name: Product_BarcodeCannotEditNote
data.value: Batch QR code cannot be changed to ensure data consistency

data.name: Product_Notice1
data.value: Editing batch information will not affect existing weighing records

data.name: Product_Notice2
data.value: Disabled batches cannot be selected during weighing

data.name: Product_Notice3
data.value: Batch QR code cannot be modified once created

data.name: Product_NotFound
data.value: Batch not found or has been deleted

data.value: No hardware devices configured in the system
